TextView.android:text: 1 Pull Up + 10.10.10. Isometric Hold (Repeat 7 times without letting go)
x3 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
7 Chin Ups + 20.20.20. Isometric Hold
x3 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Pull Ups (b) ---> 10 Pull Ups (p)
x3 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 Russian Push Ups ---> 5 Diamond Push Ups ---> 5 Pike Push Ups ---> 5 Dips
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
10x 60kg Squats ---> 15x 30kg Squats
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
15x 10kg Jumping Lunges (E/S) ---> 15 Jumping Lunges (E/S)
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
1 min Wall Sit with 10kg
x4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
20x 20kg One Leg Calf Raises ---> 20 One Leg Calf Raises
x4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
13 Pull Ups ---> 10 Russian Push Ups
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
12 Pull Ups ---> 20 Dips
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
11 Pull Ups ---> 15 Diamond Push Ups
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Pull Ups ---> 20 Push Ups
x2 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
30 Sit Ups ---> 30 Roman Twists ---> 90 seconds Plank
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
Max Chin Ups
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Bar Leg Raises ---> 10 Bar Knee Raises ---> 1 min Hollow Hold
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
50 Squats ---> 20 Lunges (E/S)
x5 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Russian Push Ups ---> 10 Push Ups ---> 10 Dips + 10.10.10. Isometric Hold
x5 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Wide Push Ups
x4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Beginner Program Level 4 - Week 3
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE
It is highly recommended to repeat this week's routine before progressing on to Week 4.
